DESCRIPTION: Creatures in Agony lose HP equal to their #yWeak at the start of their turn.
#yCrippled enemies can no longer lose #yWeak. At the end of their turn, they lose HP equal to their #yWeak.
Echoes are copies of cards with #yEthereal and #yExhaust.
After you apply a debuff to an enemy, deal #b4 damage to it.
After you play a Skill, gain #b1 #yWiz.
After you play an Attack, gain #b1 temporary #yStrength.
After you play a Skill, gain #b2 #yBlock.
At the end of the turn, you may #yRetain #b1 card.
Switch places with another character. Does nothing if there is no valid target.
Temporary HP lasts until the end of combat.
When you have at least #b3 stacks of Wiz, Attacks will consume all stacks to deal double damage.
